content: संगतिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Union, meeting, conjunction. {@--2@} Company, society, association, intercourse; मनो हि जन्मांतरसंगतिज्ञं <ls>R. 7. 15</ls>; क्षणमिह सज्जनसंगतिरिका भवति भवार्णवतरणे नौ का <ls>Moha M. 6.</ls> {@--3@} Sexual union. {@--4@} Visiting, frequenting. {@--5@} Fitness, appropriateness, applicability, consistent relation. {@--6@} Accident, chance, accidental occurrence. {@--7@} Knowledge. {@--8@} Questioning for further knowledge.
